snippet: Thomas Pynchon was one of the last great holdouts, refusing to allow his work to be sold in e-book format. Now he has relented, though, and has struck a deal with the Penguin Press to publish his entire backlist in digital form.

headline.main: Media Decoder: After Long Resistance, Pynchon Allows Novels to Be Sold as E-Books
